error-jsonwebtoken-unlogged: Permission denied. You are not logged in.
error-jsonwebtoken-session: There is a problem with your session token. {{message}}
blogs-error-permission-create: Permission denied. Only authors and administrators can create new blogs.
blogs-error-author-action-edit: Permission denied. Only the blog author or an admin can edit selected blog.
blogs-error-author-action-delete: Permission denied. Only the blog author or an admin can delete selected blog.
blogs-error-comment-delete: Permission denied. Only an admin can delete selected blog comment.
comments-error-form-comment-required: A comment text content is required.
users-error-list: Permission denied. Only admins can see the users list.
users-error-form-username-unique: The provided username is already in use. Please enter a new one.
users-error-form-username-minlength: The username must have a minimum length of {{minlength}} characters.
users-error-form-password-minlength: The password must have a minimum length of {{minlength}} characters.
users-error-form-email-valid: The provided email doesn't have a valid format.
users-create-email-content: Hi, {{username}}! Welcome to Bitacora Futura, thanks for creating a new account, now you can comment on blogs.
users-error-edit: Permission denied. You can only modify your own user.
users-error-role: Permission denied. You don't have the required role.
users-error-edit-role: Permission denied. You can only modify users from lower roles.
users-error-delete-superadmin: Permission denied. You can't delete a superadmin.
users-error-delete-user: Permission denied. Only the same user or an admin can delete selected user.
login-error-email: There is no registered user with the provided email.
login-passwordreset-email-content: A password reset was requested for this email, go to this link to change your password: {{frontLink}}
login-success-passwordreset-email: Password reset link sent to email
login-error-passwordreset-id: There is no user with the provided id.
login-error-passwordreset-token: Incorrect password reset token for the provided user.
login-error-passwordreset-password: Password reset error. Value `password` is required.
